## Summary
Describe the change and why it was made.

## Checklist (required)
- [ ] Code changes include tests or a justification why not.
- [ ] Related `.agent/specs/*` or `.agent/docs/*` updated to reflect API/behavior changes.
- [ ] `.agent/docs/tasks/*` updated to reflect task progress / next steps.
- [ ] If any behavior or API contract is ambiguous, update `.agent/docs/qa/*` with the question and decision.
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated when applicable.
- [ ] All tests pass locally (`pnpm test`).

Notes:
- If you intentionally cannot update specs/docs in this PR, add a QA entry and the label `spec-exception` explaining why and link the follow-up task.
